description: This file is a C source file implementing the Mesh Agent functionality, including system initialization, sysfs and socket communication, mesh configuration management, message processing, and inter-process communication via sockets and message queues. It contains macros, includes, variables, and functions related to mesh network setup, DHCP lease handling, sysfs/sys events, and platform-specific features.

methods.name: void Mesh_ProcessSyncMessage(MeshSync rxMsg)
methods.description: Main handler for processing incoming mesh synchronization messages, updating system events, syscfg, and triggering actions based on message types.

methods.name: void Mesh_logLinkChange(void)
methods.description: Logs link change events by triggering appropriate scripts and system events.

methods.name: int Mesh_CreateEthTunnel(int PodIdx,const char * bridge_ip,const char * pod_addr,const char * pod_dev,bool isOVSEnabled)
methods.description: Creates Ethernet tunnels between pods using GRE or VLAN interfaces, handling OVS and non-OVS modes.

methods.name: int Mesh_EthBhaulPodVlanSetup(int PodIdx,bool isOvsMode)
methods.description: Sets up VLAN interfaces and bridges for Ethernet backhaul for a given pod.

methods.name: void Mesh_EthPodTunnel(PodTunnel * tunnel)
methods.description: Creates Ethernet GRE tunnels or VLAN setups for the pod based on platform and configuration.

methods.name: leaseServer
methods.description: Thread function implementing a UDP socket server to handle DHCP lease updates and mesh-related events via dnsmasq.

methods.name: leaseServerRead
methods.description: Reads data from the lease server socket with a specified timeout.

methods.name: msgQServer
methods.description: Message queue server thread that processes queued mesh sync messages, either via Unix domain sockets or POSIX message queues.

methods.name: msgQSend
methods.description: Sends a mesh sync message to connected clients via socket or message queue.

methods.name: int Mesh_GetUrl(char * retBuf,int bufSz)
methods.description: Retrieves the current mesh URL from syscfg, defaults if not set.

methods.name: bool Mesh_SetUrl(char * url,bool init)
methods.description: Sets a new mesh URL, updates syscfg, sends notifications, and propagates to other components.

methods.name: eMeshStateType Mesh_GetMeshState()
methods.description: Gets the current mesh operational state from syscfg.

methods.name: bool Mesh_SetMeshState(eMeshStateType state,bool init,bool commit)
methods.description: Sets the mesh state, updates system configuration, and notifies other components.

methods.name: bool Mesh_GetEnabled(const char * name)
methods.description: Checks whether mesh service is enabled based on syscfg.

methods.name: set_wifi_boolean_enable
methods.description: Sets a boolean syscfg parameter for WiFi, logs the action, and reports success or failure.

methods.name: is_configure_wifi_enabled
methods.description: Checks the syscfg parameter to determine if WiFi configuration is enabled.

methods.name: is_band_steering_enabled
methods.description: Checks whether WiFi band steering is enabled via syscfg parameters.

methods.name: is_SSID_enabled
methods.description: Checks whether WiFi SSIDs are enabled or down via syscfg parameters.

methods.name: set_mesh_APs
methods.description: Enables or disables WiFi SSIDs 13 and 14 for mesh functions based on input.

methods.name: bool Mesh_getPartnerBasedURL(char * url)
methods.description: Retrieves partner-specific redirect URL via syscfg parameters.

methods.name: Mesh_setCacheStatusSyscfg
methods.description: Sets the mesh cache status in syscfg, with retries.

methods.name: Mesh_setSecuritySchemaLegacySyscfg
methods.description: Sets legacy security schema flag in syscfg, with retries.

methods.name: meshSetMeshRetrySyscfg
methods.description: Sets the mesh retry configuration in syscfg, with retries.

methods.name: meshSetEthbhaulSyscfg
methods.description: Sets Ethernet backhaul related syscfg parameter, retries included.

methods.name: meshSetXleModeCloudCtrlEnableSyscfg
methods.description: Sets XleMode cloud control enable flag via syscfg.

methods.name: meshSetGreAccSyscfg
methods.description: Enables or disables GRE acceleration in syscfg, with retries.

methods.name: meshSetOVSSyscfg
methods.description: Enables or disables OVS in syscfg, with retries.

methods.name: meshSet_sm_app_Syscfg
methods.description: Enables or disables SM app in syscfg, with retries.

methods.name: OpensyncSetSyscfg
methods.description: Sets Opensync syscfg parameter, disables legacy flag if needed, with retries.

methods.name: meshSetSyscfg
methods.description: Overall function to update mesh enable state in syscfg, with file persistence, and logs.

methods.name: void Mesh_EBCleanup()
methods.description: Disables Ethernet backhaul, resets MSS clamp flag if needed.

methods.name: bool Mesh_SetMeshEthBhaul(bool enable,bool init,bool commitSyscfg)
methods.description: Enables or disables Ethernet backhaul, updates syscfg, sends RFC update, and manages Etherenet mesh state.

methods.name: bool Mesh_SetXleModeCloudCtrlEnable(bool enable,bool init,bool commitSyscfg)
methods.description: Enables/disables the Xle Mode Cloud Control via rbus, logs success.

methods.name: get_wan_bridge
methods.description: Retrieves WAN bridge interface name via PSM, with fallback if failed.

methods.name: get_eth_interface
methods.description: Retrieves Ethernet interface from PSM.

methods.name: is_bridge_mode_enabled
methods.description: Checks whether the device is in bridge mode based on syscfg parameter.

methods.name: Mesh_getPartnerBasedURL
methods.description: Retrieves partner URL for redirector or returns false if not available.

methods.name: Mesh_setCacheStatusSyscfg
methods.description: Sets mesh cache status in syscfg with retries.

methods.name: Mesh_setSecuritySchemaLegacySyscfg
methods.description: Sets legacy security schema syscfg value with retries.

methods.name: meshSetMeshRetrySyscfg
methods.description: Sets the retry configuration in syscfg with retries.

methods.name: meshSetEthbhaulSyscfg
methods.description: Sets Ethernet backhaul syscfg, retries included.

methods.name: meshSetXleModeCloudCtrlEnableSyscfg
methods.description: Sets Xle Mode Cloud Control enable flag in syscfg.

methods.name: meshSetGreAccSyscfg
methods.description: Enables/disables GRE acceleration in syscfg with retries.

methods.name: meshSetOVSSyscfg
methods.description: Enables/disables OVS in syscfg with retries.

methods.name: meshSet_sm_app_Syscfg
methods.description: Enables/disables SM app in syscfg, retries included.

methods.name: OpensyncSetSyscfg
methods.description: Sets Opensync syscfg, disables legacy if needed, retries included.

methods.name: meshSetSyscfg
methods.description: High level function to set mesh enable in syscfg, with persistence and logs.

methods.name: Mesh_EBCleanup
methods.description: Cleans up Ethernet backhaul setup.

methods.name: Mesh_SetMeshEthBhaul
methods.description: Configures Ethernet backhaul enable/disable, updates syscfg, and sends RFC updates.

methods.name: Mesh_SetXleModeCloudCtrlEnable
methods.description: Sets cloud control enable via rbus.

methods.name: get_wan_bridge
methods.description: Fetches WAN bridge interface name, fallback to NULL on failure.

methods.name: get_eth_interface
methods.description: Fetches Ethernet interface name from PSM.

methods.name: is_bridge_mode_enabled
methods.description: Checks if device is in bridge mode based on syscfg.

methods.name: int Mesh_rebootDevice()
methods.description: Triggers device reboot via rbus parameters.

methods.name: void Mesh_sendCurrentSta()
methods.description: Sends current station interface info.

methods.name: Mesh_setXleModeChangeRbus
methods.description: Sets the XLE mode change flag via rbus.

methods.name: get_sta_active_interface_name
methods.description: Retrieves the active WiFi station interface name via rbus.

methods.name: rbusSubscribeHandler
methods.description: Handles rbus subscription events for network state updates, WiFi status, and device modes.

methods.name: handle_rbus_Subscribe
methods.description: Thread function to subscribe to rbus events and maintain active subscriptions.

methods.name: meshRbusInit
methods.description: Initializes rbus and registers relevant data elements.

methods.name: getSpeedTestTimeout
methods.description: Retrieves speed test timeout configuration from rbus.

methods.name: Mesh_sendSpeedtestMsg
methods.description: Sends speed test status message via message queue.

methods.name: speedTestHandler
methods.description: Handles speed test status events from rbus and initiates appropriate action.

methods.name: subscribeSpeedTestStatus
methods.description: Subscribes to speed test status updates via rbus.

methods.name: mesh_waitRestart
methods.description: Waits for a restart trigger, uses inotify and optional extender checks.

methods.name: getRbusStaIfName
methods.description: Fetches station interface name via rbus.

methods.name: getRbusStaBssId
methods.description: Fetches station BSSID via rbus.

methods.name: rbusSubscribeHandler
methods.description: Processes rbus events for network and WiFi status, device mode, and station connection info.

methods.name: void Mesh_backup_network(char * ifname,eMeshDeviceMode type,bool status)
methods.description: Manages backup network configuration and Ethernet backhaul using rbus and syscfg.

methods.name: Mesh_vlan_network
methods.description: Creates VLAN subinterfaces in OVS for backend VLANs.

methods.name: Mesh_sendCurrentSta
methods.description: Sends current station info.

methods.name: Mesh_setXleModeChangeRbus
methods.description: Sets XLE mode change flag via rbus.

methods.name: Mesh_SetMeshEthBhaul
methods.description: Enables or disables Ethernet backhaul, updates syscfg, sends RFC update, and manages Ethernet mesh state.

methods.name: meshSetXleModeCloudCtrlEnableSyscfg
methods.description: Sets XleMode cloud control enable flag in syscfg.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlMeshAgentInit(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the MeshAgent component, ensuring thread safety with mutex lock, and calls Mesh_Init. Reports failure or success.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlMeshAgentDeinit(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Deinitializes the MeshAgent component, ensuring thread safety with mutex lock, and calls Mesh_Deinit. Reports failure or success.
